Title: Media Tube
Description:
Media Tube makes your photos, videos fabulous with easy to use yet powerful editing tools. Tweak to your heart’s content, then get creative with oodles of effects, fonts, shapes, and frames. It's fast, easy, and fun. 
Technologies:-Windows Azure, Silverlight 3.0, ASP.NET 3.5
HomeWiki:
Media Tube makes your photos, videos fabulous with easy to use yet powerful editing tools. Tweak to your heart’s content, then get creative with oodles of effects, fonts, shapes, and frames. It's fast, easy, and fun. You can create sideshows and share it with others.
Technologies:-
Windows Azure
Sliverlight 3.0
ASP.NET 3.5

http://mediatube.cloudapp.net/
